articles.title: Palantir Rebuts Claims of Security Flaws After Stock Falls - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Palantir Technologies Inc.’s stock fell 7.5% on Friday following a report that a battlefield communications system it worked on with defense tech firm Anduril Industries Inc. was seriously flawed — a claim both companies said was out of date and inaccurate.

articles.title: Shutdown has already delayed the jobs report. More critical reports could be held up - NPR
articles.description: The government's monthly jobs report was not published Friday as a result of the federal shutdown.  That's left businesses and policymakers in the dark about the strength of the U.S. job market.

articles.description: Tesla stock came off record highs yesterday despite the company reporting record Q3 deliveries. The company is eyeing growth from AI products at a time when the core automotive business is showing signs of stagnation.

articles.description: Plug Power rises to a new 52-week high $3.95 as HC Wainwright raised its price target to a Wall Street-high $7 and maintained a Buy rating, extending gains since October 1 to nearly 70%.
